project_pocacall_desc: Convenient video calling platform without registration with a pleasant and responsive interface.
project_order_maushi_desc: Minimalist animated website for booking automated sound studios.
project_rtatex_desc: Main website of RTA Technologies. Presentation of services and team.
project_otascribe_desc: Advanced solution for audio and video transcription.
faq_stack_a: I mainly work with React, TypeScript and Bun, using modern tools like Vite and TanStack.
faq_freelance_a: Yes, I am open to interesting proposals. Contact me via the form below.
faq_contact_a: You can write to Telegram or email. Contacts are listed in the footer.
footer_subtitle: I am always open to discussing new ideas and projects. Write to me, and we will turn your idea into reality.
footer_copyright_text: Artemiy Averyanov. Developed with love for details.
